original_text: They do not understand what is right. They do not do what they have promised to do. They do not love anyone and they are not kind to anyone.
korean_text: 우매한 자요 배약하는 자요 무정한 자요 무자비한 자라

sentences.original_text: They do not understand what is right.
They do not do what they have promised to do.
and they are not kind to anyone.
